component.name: Budgie Haste Applet
component.summary: Post any text, be it code or prose, to various services directly from your desktop

description.p: Budgie Haste Applet is a Budgie Desktop widget for sharing code snippets over the Internet. It can upload text to various paste services such as Hastebin, Pastebin, GNOME Paste, etc. It can connect to any haste-server instance so you can use your own with this applet. It lives in your panel and features a clean interface for quickly sharing code snippets.
Among other things, Haste Applet can:

ul.li: Share code and plain text documents
Upload your snippets to any haste-server instance, Pastebin, GNOME Paste and others
Keep a history of your snippets
